unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for securing top talent. IIM Ahmedabad and IIT Delhi consistently produce exceptional graduates. We at XYZ Corp prioritize forging strong relationships with these institutions. Like in "3 Idiots," we believe in nurturing talent and not just grades. Our recruitment drive starts October 20th, offering packages from Rs. 8 LPA onwards. We look forward to welcoming the future leaders of India. Please send your resume to careers@xyzcorp.com before Sept 30th.
